author: Ondřej Novotný
comment: NEPROBÍHAJÍ AKTUALIZACE!! Začalo padat:-(  ---- Is it possible to backup data to external SD card? In internal memory it's useless in case of damaged phone. And what about upload backuos to google drive?

author: Daniel Muranyi
comment: Unfortunately, after switching phones I was not able to import the database. The app keeps crashing. That was it: all my data is gone. I'm not going to invest more time, setting everything up again, just to lose more data later. Bye bye CFPatrol.

reply.author: CashFlow Patrol
reply.content: We are sorry to hear that. Could you please write about the problem to out support email so we could try to fix the import? Or send you instruction how to do it?

author: Sinan Ozturk
comment: I use it for tracking the finances during vacations and it has everything I need. I especially like the widget to quickly add a new expense. the only thing I would love to have would be automatic location tracking.

author: Bhavin Kotadia
comment: All good but no use without everyother week option. Better would be to add multiplier for week or month etc.

author: Im ChangBin
comment: easy and smooth interface. the best expense managing app ive used so far.    but please add  fortnightly repeatable transactions and transacrions trackable for both resources when transferring to another resource for your update.
title: very good

author: Fribbens
comment: Lovely app however I can use it as there is no fortnightly option.
title: Fortnightly?

author: Jack T
comment: Suggestions : ability to mark an item as "recurring transaction". Saving time in entering them again in the next budget.

author: Riska Amelia
comment: Really love the interface. You can make categories, assign it with super cute colorful icon.
title: well designed

author: ชาญกมล คำจวง
comment: Easy to use and no ads. Better than other app i try. 5 stars !!

author: Adi Kwok
comment: Exchange rate sucks. make a simple one please.

author: jorgen wahlstrand
comment: Dolls then you are a trolls
title: My dollars up in smoke
